alert.note: Alert for Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:07AM MDT until July 05 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN STILLWATER AND EASTERN SWEET GRASS COUNTIES... At 106 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 23 miles north of Columbus, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rapelje, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife and Hailstone Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
